title: Nutrition and dietetics (children)
sitename: Chelsea and Westminster Hospital NHS Foundation Trust
cleaned_text: Nutrition and dietetics (children) What we do Based at Chelsea and Westminster, we specialise in the nutritional care of new-borns, infants, children and teenagers. We help patients and their families to manage their disease or condition with practical, understandable dietary treatment. We offer both inpatient and outpatient consultations and are a key part of the multi-disciplinary team and work closely with consultants, nurses, speech and language therapists, pharmacists and psychologists. We can help with: [allergies](https://www.chelwest.nhs.uk/services/childrens-services/childrens-medicine/allergy-children) [diabetes](https://www.chelwest.nhs.uk/services/childrens-services/childrens-medicine/diabetes-children) [burns](https://www.chelwest.nhs.uk/services/surgery/burns-service/burns-service) management [Prader-Willi syndrome](http://www.nhs.uk/conditions/prader-willi-syndrome/Pages/Introduction.aspx) - complex feeding difficulties Our team We are a team of six paediatric dieticians. Location Chelsea and Westminster Hospital - Clinics: Children's Outpatients, First Floor, Lift Bank D - Team: Paediatric Dietetic Office, Lower Ground Floor, Lift
